description: A recipe avocado yields to gentle pressure when held in the palm of the hand and squeezed. The fruit is not wseet, but distinctly and subtly flavored, with smooth texture. The avocado is pipular in vegetarian cuisine as a substitute for meats in sandwiches and salads because of its high fat content Generally avocado is served raw,thought some cultivars, including the common 'Hass',can be cooked for a short time without becomint bitter.IT is used as the base for the Mexican dip known as guacamole, as well as a spread on corn trtillas or toast , served with spices.

Broccoli is know to be hearty and tasty vegetable which is rich in dozen of nutrients. It is said to pack the most nutritional punchof any vegetable. when we think about green vegetables to include in our diet, broccoli is one of the foremost veggies to come to our mind .Broccoli is a cruciferous vegetable and part of the cabbage faily, which includes vegetables such as Brusel sprouts and kale.Althought the tastes are different, broccoli and these other vegetables are from the same family.

The carrot is a root vegetable that is often claimed to be perfect health food . It is crunchy, tasty and highly nutrition .Carrots are a particularly good source of beta-carotense, fiber, vitamin K, potassium and antioxidants. Carrots have a nmuber of health benefits.They are a weight loss friendly food and have been linked to lower cholesterol levels and improved eye health.

Also known as maize , corn is one of the most popular cereal grains in the world. Popcorn and sweet corn are commoly eaten varieties, but refined corn products are also widely consumed, frequently as ingredients in foods. These include tortillas, tortilla chips, polenta , cornmeal, corn flour, corn syrup , and corn oil. whole-grain  corn is an healthy as any cereal grain , rich in fiber and many vitamins , minerals, and axtioxidants.
